settings.custom_liquid:
Let your kids express themselves by showing everyone {{ product.metafields.custom.mountain.value }} is their favorite mountain with our premium youth t-shirt.
  • Premium, Soft, Fabric: Lush, breathable cotton. (Heather colors contain 50% polyester.)
  • Perfect Unisex Fit: A relaxed fit and preshrunk, this shirt is a slam dunk for boys and girls.
  • Lasting Durability: Airlume cotton and premium stitching stands up to your kid's lifestyle.
  • Official Resort Wear: Features the authentic {{ product.metafields.custom.mountain.value }} logo.

settings.title: Only The Best Tees For Your Little Ripper
settings.text:
Give your little adventurer the perfect blend of comfort and style with the {{ product.metafields.custom.mountain | metafield_text }} Ski Resort T-Shirt. Made from 100% combed and ring-spun cotton, this tee is incredibly soft and lightweight—ideal for your little mountain explorer. Whether they’re dreaming of their next ski trip or hitting the playground, this shirt is designed to move with them while staying effortlessly cool. The relaxed, unisex fit ensures all-day comfort, while the unique resort logo design gives it that standout appeal—making it an instant favorite in their wardrobe.

Crafted to withstand the daily adventures of an energetic kid, the pre-shrunk fabric ensures a great fit wash after wash. Available in heather colors with a cotton-poly blend for added durability, this tee isn’t just stylish—it’s made to last.
